de.tschebbischeff.visualizer

Class ShaderManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tschebbischeff.visualizer.ShaderManager

  • public class ShaderManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages loading and compiling shaders
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Tarek

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void compileFragmentShader(java.lang.String name)
      Compiles or recompiles the fragment shader with the given name, which sources should be loaded and adds them to the list of compiled, ready to use, shaders.
      void compileVertexShader(java.lang.String name)
      Compiles or recompiles the vertex shader with the given name, which sources should be loaded and adds them to the list of compiled, ready to use, shaders.
      void loadAndCompileFragmentShader(java.lang.String name)
      Loads a fragment shader from the shader folder, compiles them and adds them to the list of available shaders.
      void loadAndCompileShaderPair(java.lang.String name)
      Loads a vertex and fragment shader with the same name from the shader folder, compiles them and adds them to the list of available shaders.
      void loadAndCompileVertexShader(java.lang.String name)
      Loads a vertex shader from the shader folder, compiles them and adds them to the list of available shaders.

      Reads a file into a String.

      Reads the contents of a fragment shader from the shader folder.

      Reads the contents of a vertex shader from the shader folder.

      Uses the shaders specified by their names.

    • Method Detail

      • readFile

        private static java.lang.String readFile(java.lang.String filepath)
        Reads a file into a String. The file is assumed to have UTF-8 encoding.
        Parameters:
        filepath - The path to the file.
        Returns:
        The contents of the file or null, if the file does not exist or couldn't be read.

      • readVertexShader

        private static java.lang.String readVertexShader(java.lang.String name)
        Reads the contents of a vertex shader from the shader folder.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the file without its file ending.
        Returns:
        The contents of the shader file.

      • readFragmentShader

        private static java.lang.String readFragmentShader(java.lang.String name)
        Reads the contents of a fragment shader from the shader folder.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the file without its file ending.
        Returns:
        The contents of the shader file.

      • compileVertexShader

        public void compileVertexShader(java.lang.String name)
        Compiles or recompiles the vertex shader with the given name, which sources should be loaded and adds them to the list of compiled, ready to use, shaders.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the vertex shader.

      • compileFragmentShader

        public void compileFragmentShader(java.lang.String name)
        Compiles or recompiles the fragment shader with the given name, which sources should be loaded and adds them to the list of compiled, ready to use, shaders.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the fragment shader.

      • loadAndCompileShaderPair

        public void loadAndCompileShaderPair(java.lang.String name)
        Loads a vertex and fragment shader with the same name from the shader folder, compiles them and adds them to the list of available shaders.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of both the vertex and the fragment shader.

      • loadAndCompileVertexShader

        public void loadAndCompileVertexShader(java.lang.String name)
        Loads a vertex shader from the shader folder, compiles them and adds them to the list of available shaders.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the vertex shader.

      • loadAndCompileFragmentShader

        public void loadAndCompileFragmentShader(java.lang.String name)
        Loads a fragment shader from the shader folder, compiles them and adds them to the list of available shaders.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the fragment shader.

      • useShaders

        public int useShaders(java.lang.String name)
        Uses the shaders specified by their names.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the vertex and the fragment shader to use.
        Returns:
        The handle of the used shaders.

      • useShaders

        public int useShaders(java.lang.String vertexName,
                      java.lang.String fragmentName)
        Uses the shaders specified by their names.
        Parameters:
        vertexName - The name of the vertex shader to use.
        fragmentName - The name of the fragment shader to use.
        Returns:
        The handle for the compiled shader program.
